Preventive therapeutic strategy base best possible scientific evidence require . Ablation therapy , despite effective approach , associate 30-35 % arrhythmic recurrence rate . An intervention Mediterranean diet extra virgin olive oil ( EVOO ) proven effective primary prevention reduce incidence AF high-risk subject recent , large , randomized trial ( PREDIMED ) . Methods : Parallel , randomize , multicenter nutritional intervention trial 640 patient AF treat catheter ablation . Two group randomize 1:1 ratio : 1 ) intervention Mediterranean diet EVOO ; 2 ) usual care ( control group ) . The primary objective incidence atrial tachyarrhythmias two year ablation . At least 190 recurrence expect 2 year ( median ) follow-up . A relative risk 0.7 assume statistical power 80 % . Follow-up visit schedule 3 , 6 , 12 , 18 24 month . In addition in-person visit , event monitor use document episode . Dietary intervention carry nutritionist use method adapt PREDIMED trial contact every 2 month . 1 liter EVOO per week provide free intervention arm . Inflammatory marker analyze group follow-up .
